page.title: 09ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: over Scotland came to play here. Now the hall is still full each night, but of people hopeful of winning star prizes. The exciting Highland Games are held in Dunfermline annually. Stuntmen and other talented showmen often perform here, in McKane Park and Pittencrieff Park. Lots of other thrilling games and shows take place and it is very popular. Disco dancing is popular with teenagers and adults alike and there are a few places in our block which are well attended, such as "Night Magic" which was called the "Kinema Ballroom" for many years. "Johnson's" and "Chevy's" which is part of the St. Margret's Hotel, are two other popular dancing venues for adults.
